artist: Artist: Jody Williams; Publisher: Flying Paper Press, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer
description: Small book with purple covers with gold grid pattern; square cutout in cover; wire holds book closed and spine together; pink pages with abstract geometric images and hand printed text
dimension: 2 7/8 x 4 3/4 x 11/16 in. (7.3 x 12.07 x 1.75 cm) (closed, including wire)
provenance: Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer, Orono, Minn.; given to MIA, 2004.
signed: on back page, in pencil: [jody williams 15/60]
title: Intersections
